name: Scare Your Selfie - Free Selfie Scary Prank
name_original: Scare Your Selfie - Free Selfie Scary Prank
description:
Best Prank in the Appstore! #ScareYourSelfie

Convince your friends to take a selfie and let the prank do it's work.

1) Select scare, then the camera will open in selfie mode.

2) Then take photo button will will start the count down when clicked: Ready?....3.....2..... and then scary faces will show up, also a video of your friend will be taken.

This is such a scary app your friends and family will be so scared.

Use this app at your own risk!

P.S. Make sure phone is on full volume :)
